name: kutt
description: Kutt is an open source URL shortener with custom domains, link statistics, API and link management. It can be self hosted for organizations wanting branded, privacy conscious link shortening services.
features: URL Shortening: Create short, memorable URLs for long links. Simplify link sharing.
Custom Domains: Use your own branded domains for short links. Professional link branding.
Custom Slugs: Choose custom short codes for memorable URLs. Create branded short links.
Link Analytics: Track clicks, referrers, browsers, and geographic data. Understand link performance.
Password Protection: Protect links with passwords for private sharing. Secure sensitive links.
Expiration Dates: Set expiration dates for temporary links. Automatic link deactivation.
API Access: RESTful API for programmatic link creation and management. Automate URL shortening.
Browser Extension: Create short links directly from browser. Quick link generation.
QR Codes: Generate QR codes for short links automatically. Enable mobile scanning.
Link Management: Edit, delete, and organize your short links. Maintain link portfolio.
User Accounts: Multi-user support with individual link management. Team-friendly service.
Self-Hosted: Privacy-focused, own your data and infrastructure. Complete control over service.
